title: Withdraw Application
description: An applicant who has been accepted wishes to withdraw their application as they have decided to attend another university.

tasks.description: Identify the applicant and verify their identity.
Confirm the student's intent to withdraw.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student wishes to withdraw their application.

tasks.description: Update the applicant's status to 'Withdrawn' in the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the application status.
